EmailTemplate.name: OE KIT
EmailTemplate.subject: OE KIT Draft Approval Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please review and approve the attached OE Kit draft for the above mentioned group.
If any changes are needed, please use the below link to navigate to the request record and check the "Draft Changes Needed" field, identifying the needed changes in the field "Draft Change Comments."
If no changes are needed, please use the below link to navigate to the request record, enter today's date in the "Draft Approved by Sales" field and update the "OE Kit Request Stage" field to "OE Kit Approved."
Open Enrollment Request record link:
https://commercialgroup.my.salesforce.com/a0n0W00000BBsjV
Thank you.
GA Local Sales Support
